side_panel_note: Danna dama akan gunkin ƙari a cikin sandar kayan aiki na mai bincike sannan ka zaɓi "Buɗe panel na gefe". Wannan zai ba ka damar kewaya ta cikin daban-daban tabs da shafuka yayin da BlockBird ɗin ka ke bayyane koyaushe.
setup_blockbird: Danna nan don saita BlockBird ɗinka
wallet_maintenance_buttons: Maɓallan gyaran walat yanzu sun zama gumaka.
drag_drop_wallet_order: An ƙara ja da sauke domin tsara tsarin walat.
csv_import_export_wallets: An ƙara shigo da fitar da walat a CSV.
navigation_menu_icons: Abubuwan menu na kewayawa yanzu sun zama gumaka.
moved_default_page_selecting: An matsar da zaɓin shafin farkon zuwa shafin saituna.
dark_mode_theme_added: An ƙara jigo na yanayin duhu da kuma zaɓin yanayin duhu a shafin saituna.
solana_tokens_added: Token Solana: An ƙara shafin 'Token' don ganin sabbin token Solana guda 5 da aka tabbatar kuma aka jera ta Jupiter Exchange.
default_page_selector_added: An ƙara zaɓin shafin farko a kowanne shafi.
wallets_added: Wallets: An ƙara fasalin 'Wallets'. Za a iya amfani da wannan don adana adireshin walat ɗinku don kwafi mai sauri da liƙa.
styles_adjusted: An daidaita salon da launuka don dacewa da alamar mu sosai.
scanner_added: Scanner: Yana bincika shafin yanar gizo na yanzu don kalmomi 'airdrop', 'maki', da 'kyaututtuka', sannan yana nuna yawan faruwa da kuma haskaka kowanne faruwa a shafin yanar gizo.
explorer_added: Explorer: Yana bayar da jerin blockchains masu bincike tare da haɗi kai tsaye zuwa masu binciken su na block.
new_language_selector: Saituna: An ƙara sabon zaɓin yare.
current_languages_001: Harsuna: Filipino, Hindi, Hausa, Mandarin, Portuguese, Rashanci, Sifaniyanci, Thai, Yukuraini, Urdu, Vietnamese
setup_link_added: An ƙara maɓallin saitin zuwa dashboard.
scanner_description: Bincika shafin don alamun airdrop ko tsarin maki
our_scan_found_no_signs: Ba a sami alamun airdrop ko tsarin maki a wannan shafin yanar gizo ba. Kuna iya gwada bincike na wasu shafukan yanar gizo a wannan domain ɗin.
error_scanning_page: Kuskure a bincike shafin. Irin wannan shafin yanar gizo ba za a iya bincikewa ba.
explore_description: Jerin masu binciken blockchain masu bincike
wallets_description: Sarrafa walat ɗin crypto ɗinku don kwafi mai sauƙi/liƙa
label: Lakabi
recent_tokens: Sabbin token guda biyar na Solana da aka tabbatar da su ta Jupiter
